body_html:
Oops okay i missed that, incidentally -c opt / --config=opt / --copt= is super confusing.

In that case I'll update this to add strip=always, overriding that option is much easier than carrying a patch around.

body:
Oops okay i missed that, incidentally -c opt / --config=opt / --copt= is super confusing.

In that case I'll update this to add strip=always, overriding that option is much easier than carrying a patch around.
